attributes.action: Force ofgem to accelerate energy overhaul
attributes.additional_details:
Every day we are hearing calls for ofgem to do something about the energy companies. So far nothing has happened.

We need the government to force ofgem to accelerate the plan to overhaul the energy markets and give control back to the people not the big six companies. We need something now in 2011 not 2012/2013!
